;46-year-old excavator Wang Chunyan told her life story through a podcast. This time, her voice arrived In the ears of tens of thousands of people. On the construction site where the machines are roaring, she is silent most of the time. When faced with the foreman's scolding, she just pretends not to hear it and sometimes has to smile. With only one square meter in the cab, she would listen to her favorite music and sing loudly.

;

;;

;

;Women are in the minority among those who operate excavators. As one of them, Wang Chunyan’s experience is special. The picture shows the scene of drying chili peppers in Jiuquan, Gansu Province in September 2023. ;(Visual China/Picture);

;

;After the collection of stories on the theme of "My achievements have nothing to do with gender" was issued, Kou Aizhe received a large number of submissions , he was first attracted by Wang Chunyan’s message, although she only briefly expressed that as a woman, “the excavator makes me very proud.”

;

;Xiaoye, who is studying for graduate school in France, entered the podcast process as a narrator, which was full of drama. She learned that her father, whom she had not seen for many years, passed away in Cambodia. She wanted to go there, but she did not dare to leave rashly. She happened to find a podcast episode in which a Chinese man in Cambodia, Santiao, told his story about a foreign country. She finally contacted him through a message. With care, Xiaoye completed the "journey to find his father" with peace of mind, and later accepted the invitation to participate in the podcast recording with this story.

;

;On Xiaoyushu App, Xiaoye’s story has become one of the three most popular programs among all podcasts. This kind of spread effect was expected by the host Da Meng. What he didn’t expect was that as a Content workers can help some people solve real-life problems while making programs. This is the biggest healing and encouragement Xiaoye's story brings to him.

;

;Song Xinran listened to his podcast outside the massage parlor where he worked. He was embarrassed to listen in front of his colleagues and felt that his voice was unpleasant. When he told his story, there was something "very hard to explain". He is a blind marathon runner. In the show, he said: "As long as you run, you can create the wind."

;

;Kou Aizhe and Dameng are the owners of two podcasts - Story FM and Genius respectively. Founder and anchor of Catcher FM. Story FM passed its seventh birthday, and Genius Catcher FM was born at the end of 2019. The former's guest self-narration format has become a signature, while the latter uses interviews to capture the inspiration of all kinds of life. The content narrators of podcasts are often industry experts, scholars, and media people, and these two podcasts provide a stage for lay people to talk and express themselves, and amplify their voices.

;

;;

;

;There are currently relatively few Chinese podcasts where amateurs tell stories. The picture is a creative picture. ;(Visual China/Picture);

;

;They host almost the only large-scale witness story podcast in China. Dameng saw that the podcast platform classified the two into the story category, which is not a problem in itself. What is strange is that other podcasts in the same category tell ghost stories and historical stories. "They are not the same 'storytelling'."

;

;From listener to narrator

;

;Wang Chunyan had been listening to Story FM for five years before she opened her mouth to tell the story. At first, she was attracted by the eye-catching title of Story FM, but gradually she felt that it suited her very well, as it was an "unconcealed, spiritual communication program that directly faces people's hearts." She is particularly interested in stories involving life, death and human emotions, and is keenly aware that the program "focuses on more vulnerable groups."

;

;When she saw Story FM’s call for submissions to collect stories about women in gender-imbalanced industries, Wang Chunyan had a lot to say. "As a female excavator master, I don't know if I have a firm foothold, but I have persisted for more than ten years and I feel quite proud." She left a message, "I didn't expect Ai Zhe to really see it.";

;When the epidemic broke out, Xiaoye developed the habit of listening to podcasts. She described that she had some obsessive-compulsive disorder at the time. After discovering Genius Catcher FM, she listened to every program from the beginning. Xiaoye, who already likes to listen to different life stories, is like finding a treasure. He keeps listening to it until now. The program invited many people from all walks of life to tell their career stories. She was deeply impressed by the psychiatrist Chen Baiyou among them, because what she told was very touching and different from the public perception. "She said that only kind people will suffer from mental illness, which touched me very much." Xiaoye told Southern Weekend reporters.

;

;Xiaoye’s parents went to Cambodia to work together. She was also born in Cambodia. After her parents divorced, her mother took Xiaoye back to China to develop, while her father stayed in Cambodia. In June 2022, Xiaoye learned about her father's death through relatives. On Father's Day a week later, she sent her blessings to her father's WeChat, but she did not expect a response from the other party. A strange Cambodian woman contacted Xiaoye and claimed to be her father's partner. Later, she invited Xiaoye to Phnom Penh to participate in her father's 100-day festival. When she was hesitating whether to go there, she happened to see Genius Catcher FM's push "I collected corpses for Chinese people in Cambodia, but I didn't dare to show the faces of the corpses to their families." She left messages for Dameng on various platforms, hoping to get to know the narrator, Santiao, and Dameng set up a connection between the two.

;

;Sanjou said to Xiaoye: "Just come, I will pick you up at the airport." As soon as she left the airport gate, Xiaoye saw the woman holding a photo of her father, but she always felt that she would just go with this stranger , feeling panicked. At this time, Sanjou appeared. He grabbed Xiaoye's suitcase and protected her from behind. On the first day of Xiaoye's arrival, Sanjou drove with him all the way, and even called his girlfriend, who could speak English and Cambodian, to act as a translator for Xiaoye.

;

;Xiaoye bought an urn at the local market and took away part of his father's ashes. Among his father's belongings, there was a small box containing several photos with Xiaoye. Xiaoye also discovered that although he had not seen his father since his second year in junior high school, his passport still had records of entering China several times.

;

;After Xiaoye returned to daily life, Dameng chatted with her for an hour or two and recorded this life experience.

;

;His father was absent when Xiaoye was growing up. Whether it was on the phone or via WeChat, Xiaoye felt that he could not truly communicate with each other. But within just two or three days of staying in a foreign land, Xiaoye realized that his father had been thinking about him. From a group of strange Cambodian people, she heard her relatives call her: baby, with an exaggerated pronunciation and mouth shape, which was unique to her father. She thought about how many times her father had to say it before everyone around him remembered it. Some listeners shed tears after hearing this detail.

;

;;

;

;The stories of the Chinese in Cambodia have been made into a series of podcasts, including the story of Xiaoye going to participate in his father's 100-day festival. The picture shows the Day of the Dead in Phnom Penh, Cambodia in October 2023. ;(Visual China/Photo);

;

;Wang Chunyan has been driving excavators for more than ten years. When she talked about taking hormones to gain weight in order to collect bills more easily and avoid being sexually harassed, Kou Aizhe was shocked and confirmed again, did you really take hormones to gain weight?

;

;There are many inconveniences for women working as excavators, such as the lack of toilets at the construction site. For this reason, Wang Chunyan would leave home at around 5 a.m. and get off work at around 8 p.m. without taking a sip of water. Sometimes she couldn't hold it in any longer, so she would dig a hole for emergencies. Not many people can persist. Wang Chunyan has built a "National Queen Group", which has 99 female excavator operators, roughly 1/3 of which have mature skills. She has accepted three female apprentices, and they either changed careers or started working on their own. When you are the boss, you no longer do it yourself.

;

;Wang Chunyan persisted mainly to make money. Doing other jobs cannot support this family. When she was 16 years old, her abducted sister returned home nine months pregnant. Both her mother and sister suffer from mental illness, and her father-in-law is careless. The family's livelihood depends entirely on Wang Chunyan. Later, her husband was in a car accident and became a vegetative state. After he woke up and was discharged from the hospital paralyzed, he owed a large amount of medical expenses, which Wang Chunyan has been paying over the years.

;

;More than two months after the podcast was released, many listeners left messages and were moved by her tenacity, courage, and optimism. Wang Chunyan didn't pay much attention to this feedback. She was working every day in the past few days and "didn't stop to review those things."

;

;Speak out your worries and hear new knowledge

;

;Wang Chunyan has never told her family about the hardships she experienced outside. Her sister, mother, and husband are all patients. Her parents-in-law have never wanted to see her because of her family background. She, there was almost no emotional communication between the two parties. "I don't have an outlet to vent. Sometimes I feel very depressed and want a space to talk." Talking about her life in the podcast fulfilled her wish to talk.

;

;Kou Aizhe understands this mentality very well, “Everyone needs to tell something that has been buried in his heart for a long time, or some obstacles that he cannot get over, or he is confused about this matter and wants to hear some people’s opinions. Feedback, but he may not want people around him to hear it, for example, he cannot accept these people judging him." Some of the more secretive stories are basically from the narrator's initiative.

;

;During the interview, if the narrator states that he does not want certain details to be disclosed, such as name, city, and industry, they will be blurred. This protection of anonymity also gives the narrator more courage.

;

;"It's anonymous anyway, no one knows who I am, so I can say whatever I want." Xiaoye received Da Meng's recording invitation and readily agreed. She was very happy to be on the podcast she often listens to. , at the same time, she felt that this story was "quite bizarre, outrageous, and worth telling" and wanted to share it with more people.

;

;In Dameng’s view, recording a podcast is a process in which the narrator and the producer complement each other. "Sometimes people experience some legendary things and want to record them. Some people are willing to write and some are willing to talk about it. It is also important for the guests to record their own experiences on our program. Let me help them complete it. Content editor."

;

;"Because everyone's life is boring and they are curious about what other people live, so they especially like to listen to such stories. For me, this is a way to see the world. The window is mainly for fun." Xiaoye explained why people love to listen to stories told by another ordinary person so much.

;

;For producers, the fun of doing programs is largely due to the ability to gain new knowledge and broaden their cognitive boundaries. When I first started doing a series of stories about Cambodian characters, almost every issue would refresh Da Meng’s understanding. The narrators all live in Phnom Penh and Sihanoukville, Cambodia, helping Chinese people in trouble in foreign lands. Santiao was the first one to share on the show. He volunteered to help Chinese people who died accidentally in Cambodia, process and cremate their bodies, and transport them back to China. Later, Dameng interviewed Jie Ge and Aaron one after another. They used their own methods to protect the Chinese wandering in Cambodia or guide them on their way home.

;

;The Beijing Long Distance Running Festival in April 2023 made Dameng pay attention to He Yajun’s Blind Assistance Group. After contacting several blind runners in the group, he chose Song Xinran as the subject of his story. The theme of the program is about "wind". Every Wednesday and Saturday morning, Song Xinran runs with nearly a hundred teammates in the Beijing Olympic Forest Park, passing through flowers, bamboo forests, and ponds. The blind friend and the running aid volunteer are connected by a running aid rope for the blind.

;

;;

;

;Song Xinran, a blind man, talked about his experience in long-distance running. The picture shows a blind running rope connecting a blind marathon runner (left) and a volunteer guiding him (right) in Tai'an, Shandong in 2017. ;(Visual China/Picture);

;

;The competition that Song Xinran is most proud of is the 2019 Beijing Long Distance Running Festival. He ran hard and ran within the prescribed time. He crossed the finish line and won the qualification for his runner to pass through to the "Northern Marathon" competition. Running has become an indispensable part of Song Xinran's life. The customers who come for massage are also infected by him and start practicing running. Sometimes when talking about pace, they praise it, it’s so fast. You have bad eyesight and you can run faster than us.

;

;Story FM has also invited some blind narrators. Although everyone has their own interests and hobbies, when it comes to employment, most of them can only go for massages. In a later episode, a group of blind employees from Xiaomi in Shanghai were invited to talk about how they worked as markers and trained the AI ​​Xiao Ai classmates. A blind listener in Xi'an listened to the program and kept sending messages to Kou Aizhe, telling him how the program inspired him. Kou Aizhe witnessed his changes little by little. The latest news was that he came to report good news: Xiaomi was recruiting blind people to do similar work in Xi'an, and he successfully applied.

;

;Listening to strangers’ stories sometimes has such a direct impact on the audience that they respond in their own lives. As the popularity of the program increased, Dameng discovered that many listeners regarded Genius Catcher FM as a career guide. A program by a space organizer inspired several listeners to start engaging in related work. A person passed the police civil service examination and sent a private message saying that he was not a police major. After listening to the program, he yearned for the honor and experience of this profession and had a belief. I was so moved and frightened that I turned on the program and listened to it again, "Don't say anything nonsense."

;

;Let different people "penetrate each other"

;

;Xiaoye likes to listen to podcasts in the shower and while commuting. Chatting podcasts rank first in her mind. “They are the kind where the host is chatting, and you listen and feel like you can join in, so you can’t help but join in the discussion.” One time while commuting, she heard something funny and stopped to stamp her feet on the street and burst into laughter. Life seemed to have a different color because her ears were plugged and she couldn't hear the sounds outside. At that moment, she felt happy and contented, "This is my world."

;

;When operating an excavator, if the construction site is large enough, has a good view, and the work is not too tight, Wang Chunyan will turn on the stereo and listen to something. Only in the one-square-meter cab of the excavator can she have some time of her own. The rest of the time belongs to others. "Coming home is like fighting a war."

;

;Wang Chunyan also plays Douyin. Among the bloggers she follows, there are many ideological ones, but she believes that "Douyin is just a kind of fast food, and the real nutritious meal is podcasts." Podcasts arouse her deep understanding. There is more to think about than short videos.  

;

;A podcast episode is usually tens of minutes long, or even as long as two or three hours. Unlike short videos and other content, Dameng pointed out that the main value that podcasts, long-form content that focuses on reality, can bring to listeners is "companionship and recognition."

;

;He interviewed the founders of transgender groups, social workers who helped female domestic workers, and niche professional or hobby groups, trying to reflect the situation of a group of people through their narration of their fate and experiences, and make many people who originally felt People who are very lonely are no longer so lonely.

;

;In podcasts where amateurs tell stories, the narrator’s expressive ability is not that important. Dameng believes that the value of stories to people, the scarcity of information, and the desire of guests to share are all more important than the ability to express themselves. Kou Aizhe bluntly said that the so-called ability to express well is actually a privilege. What Story FM wants to do is to break it rather than strengthen it. "Those who are not so eloquent in expression have very good stories and very good experiences, but they It is a pity to remain silent."

;

;Kou Aizhe interviewed a contributor, a female worker on the assembly line. For many years, she tried to take her children with her and live with her in the city, but she encountered obstacles everywhere. Later, she also tried to return to her hometown. Find a job, but there are no good jobs in my hometown to support my family and give my children a better life. Although her education level is not high and her expression is simple and unpretentious, she resonates with many parents from middle-class families in first-tier cities. Parents' love and devotion to their children and the struggles in raising children are common.

;

;“I don’t want people to use a certain label to evaluate a person. This may be what my story wants to show.” Kou Aizhe wants to use the podcast to let people of different classes or classes People "penetrate each other", understand what their respective lives are like, and have a better understanding.

;

;Wang Chunyan once listened to the program "Behind the 50 million blind date game, do billionaires still believe in love" with curiosity. She concluded, "The basic characteristics of us as a person are sincerity and sincerity, whether he is a multi-millionaire or an ordinary citizen. ;";

; < p>; "Whether it is a short video, or some short posts, pictures and texts, we will soon get a conclusion, but in the podcast, we can follow the people who have experienced it and retrace this person's growth and experience. , you will find that there is complexity behind everything and everyone." Dameng told Southern Weekend reporters.

;

;"Just see this side of me"

;

;Song Xinran's podcast was forwarded to the running group by the captain. His teammates praised him and told stories that were very true. I hope he will do it again in the future. I can hear the story told by him himself. He also mentioned in the podcast how he and his girlfriend met and fell in love. The two trained together in a running group and gradually developed a relationship. On the day he confessed his love, he hugged his girlfriend. Someone in the group heard it and teased, "Young people today are so courageous. We didn't dare to do that back then." After listening to the show, his girlfriend also blamed Song Xinran for "talking about the two of them" So straightforward."

;

;Xiaoye listened to that episode of her show to her friends. Several friends she was not familiar with sent her long essays on WeChat. The central idea was comfort and praise, "You did a really good job with me." Goodbye". Xiaoye likes to ask friends who have listened to it, did you cry ;? ;When the other party said he was crying, Xiaoye thought, "Okay, I feel like I have earned something."

;

;Wang Chunyan is very low-key about recording podcasts, and her daughter is the only one she shares with. During the three years when Wang Chunyan accompanied her husband to the hospital in Zhejiang, her daughter was sent back to her hometown in Hubei. When she was in elementary school, she was bullied on campus and suffered from depression. She has always been rebellious and rarely communicated with her parents. Wang Chunyan didn't know how her daughter felt specifically after hearing this, because she didn't say anything and didn't contact him until a day later. But from then on, her daughter became willing to chat with Wang Chunyan and became more concerned about her.

;

;On the trip to Cambodia, Xiaoye said nothing to his relatives, including his mother, and naturally did not let them know about the podcast he had recorded. Father is a topic that Xiaoye and her mother tacitly avoid talking about. Xiaoye also doesn’t want her mother to know that she went to Cambodia: “On the one hand, because she is a bit controlling, I still act like a more obedient daughter most of the time. , I will try my best to listen to her opinion on such a big matter. She told me very seriously before that she didn’t want me to go, but out of my own stubbornness, I went anyway. And I didn’t really want her to know that she was There is another lady in Cambodia who lives with my dad, and I don’t want her to be away from my dad for so long and have to think about my dad’s affairs.”

;

;However, Xiaoye also hopes that her mother will find out about this. Maybe the two of them will be more open to talking about it. Xiaoye decided not to tell her proactively, and recording the podcast was like burying a clue. Maybe she would find it, and maybe it would become a secret forever.

;

;Story FM invites producers to conduct a "year-end summary" in 2022. One of the producers mentioned that when he was producing a program, he was so moved by a confession from the interviewee that he thought of ending the program with this paragraph. However, the interviewee then asked: "How is it? I So it can arouse the audience's emotions, right?" The producer suddenly realized that even interviews that pursue documentary often only enlarge the fragments of a person's life, so he wanted to remind the audience: don't care so much.

;

;In the first few days after the show aired, Xiaoye paid attention to the comments. When she saw someone saying that they really wanted to follow Xiaoye's Weibo, she thought to herself, please don't. "When you listen to my story, this is one side of me, but if you really pay attention to my life, it's the other side. People are multi-faceted. Just see this side of me. I don't want to show it in all directions. I don’t like it in front of the public.”

;

;The podcast condenses a small part of their life memories, and the real life continues, which is far more complicated than the story being told.

;

;Wang Chunyan said in the program that she made a wish in front of Bodhisattva at that time. If her husband wakes up, she is willing to give him half of his life span and only live to 50 years old. She will reach this age in a few years, and she hopes to travel and live a life for herself.

;

;In reality, Wang Chunyan, in addition to her passion and bravery, also has a level of sobriety and coldness that has been polished by her circumstances. She believes, "I have seen too many things in the world, and it is of no use to live so much. Living to 50 years old is enough." When she went to the mental hospital to visit her sister, she no longer recognized her, and she needed others to hand her water and food before she could eat. She thought, in that state, what role did maintaining her sister's life play? It was just to make herself, a relative, feel at ease. She has read "Dream of Red Mansions" countless times, and is no stranger to the illusion of life.

;

;At the end of the interview, she suddenly asked the Southern Weekend reporter whether bone marrow donation (commonly known as hematopoietic stem cell donation) would have any impact on the donor's health. She had applied for a voluntary donation of hematopoietic stem cells, and recently had an initial meeting with a patient. The match was successful, but my daughter disagreed. If it does not affect her work, she still hopes to contribute: "A life is waiting, and it would be too cruel not to save it."

;

;(Xiaoye and Santiao are pseudonyms in the article)

;;National parks are the most important in our country Natural ecological space is the most important part of the natural ecosystem, with the most unique natural landscape, the most essential natural heritage, and the richest biodiversity. The establishment of a national park system is something that General Secretary Xi Jinping personally planned, deployed, and promoted as a "big man in the country." Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core has stood at the strategic height of realizing the sustainable development of the Chinese nation and made a series of major strategic arrangements to promote the establishment of a national park system and accelerate the construction of natural protection with national parks as the main body. system, and effectively strengthen the protection of natural ecology. On October 12, 2021, President Xi Jinping announced at the 15th Leaders’ Summit of the Conference of the Parties to the Convention on Biological Diversity that my country has officially established the Sanjiangyuan, giant pandas, Siberian tigers and leopards, Hainan tropical rainforests, Wuyi Mountains, etc. The approval of the national park marks that this major innovative system of national parks has taken root and the construction of national parks has entered a new level. In November 2022, my country issued the "National Park Spatial Layout Plan", which clarified the work process, main construction tasks and implementation safeguards for the establishment of national parks, selected 49 national park candidate areas, and outlined a plan for building the world's largest national park. The grand blueprint of the system. ;

;

;;The construction of high-quality national parks is an important part of the construction of my country's ecological civilization system. It is important for promoting the scientific protection and rational utilization of natural resources, promoting the harmonious coexistence of man and nature, and promoting a beautiful China. Construction is of extremely important significance. In recent years, the People's Court has always adhered to the guidance of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, deeply implemented Xi Jinping Thought on the Rule of Law and Xi Jinping Thought on Ecological Civilization, and thoroughly implemented the concept of dynamic judiciary. It persisted in serving the overall situation, administering justice for the people, and properly hearing cases in accordance with the law. Various environmental resource cases involving national parks, including environmental pollution prevention and control, ecological protection and restoration, and resource development and utilization, strive to promote the high-level protection and high-quality development of my country's national parks. In order to strengthen the publicity of the rule of law in national parks, cultivate national park culture, spread the concept of national parks, and demonstrate the effectiveness of the people's courts in protecting national parks, the Supreme People's Court released a series of typical cases on the judicial protection of national parks.

;

;Ten typical cases are released this time, with the following highlights. First, there are many types of litigation involved and the scope of protection is wide. This batch of typical cases includes different types of litigation such as environmental resources criminal, civil and public interest litigation, covering the main scope of environmental resources trials; the national parks involved include Sanjiangyuan, Giant Panda, Siberian Tiger and Leopard, and Hainan Tropical Rainforest Five of the first national parks to be established, including Wuyi Mountain and Qianjiangyuan-; Baishanzu National Park, were included in the National Park Spatial Layout Plan. There are many types of national park protection cases and lawsuits, and the scope of national park protection is wide. The second is to insist on active justice. Case 5: Wang Min and six others were involved in a criminal incidental public interest litigation case of indiscriminate logging of trees and endangering nationally protected plants, and case 9: Zhang Mouyan and Zhang Mouyi sued the Yangxian County Forestry Bureau over the right to life dispute. The People's Court found during the trial that We do not use mechanical justice to solve the loopholes and shortcomings in the management of national parks. Instead, we actively extend the environmental resources adjudication function, actively integrate into the process of ecological civilization construction, issue judicial suggestions to administrative departments, and urge relevant departments to identify and fill vacancies. It is a vivid practice of active justice. The third is to adhere to the concept of integrated protection and systematic governance. Case 3: The case of environmental pollution by Yang and other three persons, which reflects the people's court's strengthening of the management of environmental pollution in the area adjacent to the Giant Panda National Park; Case 4: Li and 11 other persons endangering precious and endangered wild animals, criminal incidental civil public interest litigation , the People's Court launched a full-chain crackdown on the "hunting-acquisition-transportation-sales" link of crimes that endanger precious and endangered wild animals, which is a vivid practice of integrated protection and systematic governance. The fourth is to adhere to the strictest rule of law principle. Case 1 ; In the illegal mining cases of Zheng Moucheng, Gao Mojin, and Ye Moudong, for illegal mining of national strategic resources, severe punishment is required within the statutory range of punishment, and the application of suspended sentences is strictly controlled, and judicial use is used to The sword ensures the development and utilization of national strategic resources. Case 7: The First Branch of the Hainan Provincial People's Procuratorate sued Li Mouqing and Ye Mouqing for ecological damage civil public interest litigation. While the perpetrators had been sentenced to criminal liability in another case, their civil liability for compensation was seriously pursued, which reflected the responsibility for damage and the ultimate goal. The principle of strict rule of law. Case 8: The People’s Procuratorate of Kaihua County, Zhejiang Province sued Lu Mouyan and four others for ecological damage civil public interest litigation. The illegal purchase and sale of wild animals through recording of slaughtering videos for inspection, online payment, mail delivery, etc. shall be severely punished in accordance with the law. It demonstrates the attitude of protecting the ecological environment of the national park with the strictest system and strictest rule of law. Fifth, adhere to preventive justice. Case 4: Li Mouhua and 11 other persons were involved in a civil public interest litigation incidental to the crime of endangering precious and endangered wild animals. This case was implemented against criminals who are zoo operators in order to prevent them from taking advantage of the convenient conditions for acquiring, raising, selling, and transporting wild animals. For such crimes, the People's Court imposed a "prohibition order" on them, which reflects the concept of preventive justice. Sixth, properly handle the relationship between people's livelihood, development and protection. Case 2: In the case of Zhang Mouqiang’s illegal manufacturing of guns and illegal hunting, probation was applied to local villagers who had just escaped from poverty to prevent families who had just escaped from poverty from returning to poverty due to punishment, and better balanced the relationship between ecological environment protection and people’s livelihood security. Case 6: Li Mouliang, Yang Mouli’s fire, and Yang Mouli’s illegal hunting criminal incidental civil public interest litigation case. Taking into account the financial difficulties of the defendants, they were allowed to perform off-site ecological restoration obligations through labor compensation, which reflected the judicial emphasis on people’s livelihood protection. Concerned. Case 9: Zhang Mouyan and Zhang Mouyi sued the Yangxian County Forestry Bureau for a dispute over the right to life. In accordance with the relevant provisions of the Wildlife Protection Law, the family members of those injured or killed by wild animals were supported in their request for compensation from the relevant departments, which reflected a balanced consideration. The dual goals of wildlife protection and safeguarding the safety of people’s lives and property. Case 10: The bankruptcy and reorganization case of a hydropower development company in Qinghai, giving full play to the role of trial functions, strengthening coordination with relevant government departments, promoting the full resumption of work of the hydropower station involved in the case, effectively resolving corporate bankruptcy disputes, and properly handling social and economic development and ecological environmental protection Relationship. ;

;

;;The proper hearing of these ten typical cases of judicial protection of national parks in accordance with the law fully demonstrates the people's courts' ability to play the role of trial of ecological environment resources and protect the integrity of the natural ecosystem of national parks in accordance with the law. The responsibility of maintaining national ecological security, protecting biodiversity, and promoting high-level protection and high-quality development of national parks. ;

;

;;;Typical cases of judicial protection of national parks;;

;

;;1. Zheng Moucheng and Gao Mojin , Ye Moudong’s illegal mining case;

;

;;;1. Illegal mining cases of Zheng Moucheng, Gao Moujin and Ye Moudong;;

;

;;[Basic facts of the case];

;

;;The defendant Zheng Moucheng jointly contracted with others the forest land located in a mountain farm in Luanfeng Township, Guangze County, Fujian Province. The mountain farm is located within the scope of Wuyishan National Park . Zheng Moucheng and the defendant Gao Moucheng became friends, and the two planned to jointly mine rare earths for profit in the mountain farm. From September 2016 to May 2017, Zheng Moucheng and Gao Mojin organized Feng Mouan, Zhong Mouming (all handled in separate cases) and defendant Ye Moudong and others to go to the mine without a mining license. The mountain farm mines rare earth minerals by digging caves in the mountain, injecting ammonium sulfate, etc., and then precipitating the precipitated liquid. 9,300 kilograms of suspected rare earth semi-finished products were seized on site. After identification, the rare earth minerals involved in the case are all ion-adsorbed rare earths, which are specific mineral types stipulated by the state for protective mining. The illegal mining behavior of Zheng Moucheng and others also caused damage to the mineral resources of rare earth mineral sites. In addition, it was also found that Ye Moudong had a dispute and fight with others over trivial matters in March 2018, and was guilty of intentional injury causing minor injuries. Guangze County, Fujian Province prosecuted Zheng Moucheng, Gao Mojin, and Ye Moudong for illegal mining, and Ye Moudong for intentional injury. ;

;

;;[Judgment Result];

;

;;After trial, the People’s Court of Guangze County, Fujian Province held that the defendants Zheng Moucheng and Gao Moumou Jin, Ye Moudong and others violated the provisions of the Mineral Resources Law and exploited the ion adsorption rare earth mineral of a specific mineral type that the state implements protective mining without a mining license. The circumstances were particularly serious and constituted the crime of illegal mining. Zheng Moucheng and Gao Jin are the principal offenders, and Ye Moudong is an accessory. Zheng Moucheng and Gao Moujin were sentenced to four years and nine months in prison respectively for the crime of illegal mining and fined 150,000 yuan. Ye Moudong was sentenced to three years in prison for the crime of illegal mining and intentional injury. year, and be fined 100,000 yuan; the rare earth semi-finished products seized will be confiscated. After the verdict was pronounced, the defendant Gao Moujin refused to accept the verdict and filed an appeal. The second instance ruling of Nanping Intermediate People's Court of Fujian Province dismissed the appeal and upheld the original judgment. ;

;

;;[Typical significance];

;

;;Wuyishan National Park is currently the only one in my country that is both a world man and biosphere reserve and a The national park, a world cultural and natural heritage, contains numerous non-renewable and valuable mineral resources. Among them, rare earths are important strategic resources for our country and are key elements in emerging industries, high-end manufacturing, and modern national defense science and technology industry. In recent years, criminal acts of illegal mining of rare earths have occurred in the areas around Wuyishan National Park, damaging the country's rare earth resource reserves and seriously threatening the security of the national park's environmental resources. The defendant in this case mined rare earth minerals using the in-situ leaching method, which endangered the ecological service functions and ecosystem stability of Wuyishan National Park, and easily led to vegetation destruction, mountain exposure, water source pollution, soil erosion, landslides, ground cracks and subsidence, etc. Serious consequences occur. When the value of the mined mineral products and the value of the damage caused to the mineral resources have been ascertained, the people's court determined that the defendant's illegal mining behavior was particularly serious based on the value of the damage caused to the mineral resources, and severely punished the crime of illegal mining of rare earths in accordance with the law. Strict punishment within the penalty range and strict control over the application of suspended sentences will help ensure the development and utilization of national strategic resources and protect the ecological security of national parks. ;

;;;2. Zhang Mouqiang’s illegal manufacturing of firearms and illegal hunting case;;

;

;;[Basic case facts 】;

;

;;During 2017, the defendant Zhang Mouqiang went to a hardware store in Haikou City, Hainan Province to buy a nail gun, a barrel, iron sand, and nail bullets. , using its own tools to assemble a gun-shaped object. After identification, the gun-shaped object manufactured by Zhang Mouqiang was a gun that used gunpowder as its firing power. In the early morning of March 21, 2022, Zhang Mouqiang entered the Bawangling Branch of Hainan Tropical Rainforest National Park, which is designated as a protected hunting area, without permission from the wildlife administrative department, and without a hunting license or a gun license. During the hunting at the flood management station, a total of 3 red-bellied squirrels, 1 coconut cat, and 1 ferret badger were hunted using guns, and 30 big green stink frogs were hunted using headlights. Zhang Mouqiang was caught on the spot by the public security police on his way down the mountain the next day. After identification, the coconut cat involved in the case is a national second-level protected wild animal. The ferret badger and red-bellied squirrel are included in the "List of Terrestrial Wild Animals Protected by the State as Beneficial or of Important Economic and Scientific Research Value." The smelly frog belongs to Hainan. The province focuses on protecting terrestrial wildlife. The Second Branch of the Hainan Provincial People's Procuratorate prosecuted Zhang for illegally manufacturing firearms and illegal hunting. ;

;

;;[Judgment Result];

;

;;Hainan Provincial No. 2 Intermediate People’s Court held after trial that Zhang’s violent behavior constituted illegality The crimes of manufacturing firearms and illegal hunting should be punished concurrently. As a villager living in a national park area who has just emerged from poverty, Zhang Mouqiang still needs time to explore to change the local traditional production and lifestyle and take the road of green development to improve people's livelihood. Zhang Mouqiang is the main labor force in his family. His detention is not in compliance with the modesty principle of the criminal law and may also return his family to poverty. The authority of the law lies in the inevitability of punishment rather than its severity. When lighter punishment can be used to achieve the purpose of sanction, there is no need to use severe sanctions. In view of the fact that Zhang Mouqiang was a first-time offender, he truthfully confessed his crime after the incident, pleaded guilty and accepted punishment, and showed remorse. His place of residence was willing to cooperate with community corrections, and it was declared that the suspended sentence would have no major adverse impact on the community where he lived. The verdict was then given: Zhang Mouqiang was punished for several crimes, and it was decided to execute a three-year prison sentence, suspended for five years, and confiscate criminal tools. After the verdict was announced, the parties did not appeal or protest, and the first-instance judgment has become legally effective. ;

;

;;[Typical significance];

;

;;In April 2022, General Secretary Xi Jinping clearly pointed out that tropical rainforest countries The park is a national treasure, a reservoir, a grain depot, a money storehouse, and even a carbon storehouse. It requires strict protection of the tropical rainforest to achieve the unity of ecological protection, green development, and improvement of people's livelihood. Although the protection of environmental resources continues to increase during the construction of the Hainan Tropical Rainforest National Park, harmful use of tropical rainforest and biodiversity resources by indigenous villagers near the national park still occurs from time to time. In this case, the defendant violated hunting regulations and used modified guns and other tools for hunting in the game reserve, which destroyed the value of wild animal resources and should be subject to criminal sanctions. At the same time, the people's court fully considered the individual factors of the defendant, gave him the opportunity to rehabilitate, and applied suspended sentences to prevent families who had just escaped from poverty from returning to poverty due to punishment, demonstrated the humanistic care of the judiciary, and achieved the purpose of combining punishment and crime prevention. , and also better balances the relationship between ecological environment protection and people's livelihood security. ;

;;;3. Case of environmental pollution by Yang and three others;;

;

;;[Basic case facts]< /span>;

;

;;From June to September 2020, the defendants Yang, Qu Moumin, and Gao Hu did not obtain a hazardous waste business license and did not take ground protection measures. , in the mountain forest of a village in Huaping Town, Anzhou District, Mianyang City, Sichuan Province, adjacent to the Giant Panda National Park protection area, 14.53 tons of waste engine oil grids were crushed and disposed using crushers and other equipment, and scrap iron and waste engine oil were separated and Sale. The three defendants made an illegal profit of 26,450 yuan from selling scrap iron and more than 6,000 yuan from selling waste engine oil. The Mianyang Municipal Ecological Environment Bureau determined that the waste oil grid involved in the case was a filter adsorption medium containing or contaminated with waste engine oil. It was included in the "National Hazardous Waste List", with waste category HW49 and waste code 900-041-49, and was classified as hazardous waste. . After evaluation, the highest concentration of petroleum hydrocarbons in the soil of the plot involved in the case is 3080mg/Kg, which exceeds the screening value for the first type of land in Table 1 of the "Soil Environmental Quality Standards for Soil Pollution Risk Management and Control of Construction Land (Trial)" (GB36600-2018), and it is determined The land is contaminated by petroleum hydrocarbons, and this illegal production has caused damage to the soil ecological environment of the land. The three defendants all surrendered, voluntarily pleaded guilty and punished, signed a recognizance, and voluntarily returned the illegal income of 33,000 yuan. The People's Procuratorate of Anzhou District, Mianyang City, Sichuan Province launched a public prosecution against Yang, Qu and Gao for the crime of environmental pollution. ;

;

;;[Judgment Result];

;

;;After hearing, the People’s Court of Anzhou District, Mianyang City, Sichuan Province held that Yang and Qu Min and Gao Hu violated national regulations and illegally disposed of hazardous waste, seriously polluting the environment and constituting the crime of environmental pollution. The three defendants committed a joint crime, and their criminal roles were equal, without distinguishing between the principal and the accomplice; the three defendants voluntarily surrendered and truthfully confessed their crimes, so they surrendered, and may be given a lighter or reduced punishment in accordance with the law; the three defendants voluntarily confessed and accepted punishment, and may be treated leniently ; The three defendants who voluntarily return all their illegal gains may be given a lighter punishment as appropriate. The verdict was then: Yang, Qu Min, and Gao Hu were each sentenced to nine months in prison and suspended for one year each. They were also fined 15,000 yuan each, and their illegal gains of 33,000 yuan were confiscated (already recovered). After the verdict was announced, the parties did not appeal or protest, and the first-instance judgment has become legally effective. ;

;

;;[Typical meaning];

;

;;Forest soil is the material basis for the development of forestry production. In recent years, some lawless elements, motivated by profit, have invaded mountain farm forest land, illegally recycled waste engine oil, and dumped toxic and harmful substances, causing serious damage to forest land soil and its accompanying crops, disrupting the ecological balance of the forest, and harming public interests. The place where this case occurred is adjacent to the Giant Panda National Park protection area. Since the waste engine oil pollution medium is fluid and migratory, the environmental pollution incident caused by waste engine oil should not only be based on the boundaries of the national park, but also the borders of the national parks. Comprehensive and integrated regional protection. In this case, the People's Court punished criminal acts that polluted the environment in accordance with the law, comprehensively strengthened the protection of environmental resources, adhered to the harmonious coexistence of man and nature, and practiced the concept that clear waters and lush mountains are valuable assets. In order to accelerate the formation of green development methods, promote economic development and the environment Protecting a win-win situation provides legal protection. ;

;;;4. Li Mouhua and other 11 people’s criminal incidental civil public interest litigation case of endangering precious and endangered wild animals;;

;

;;[Basic Case Facts];

;

;;Since 2019, the defendant Li Mouhua contacted the defendant Long Moujun many times to hunt wild red pandas alive. From 2019 to April 2020, Long Moujun sold 15 live wild red pandas he captured to Li Mouhua and the defendant Li Mouqiu (Li Mouhua’s son); Li Mouhua and his son transported 14 of them to He went to Laizhou, Shandong, Nanjing, Jiangsu and other places, and sold 2 animals to the defendant Liu Moujia, and sold a total of 10 animals to three other zoo operators (handled separately), making an illegal profit of 290,000 yuan. From November to December 2020, Long Moujun purchased 4 live wild red pandas from the defendant Gao Moulin, released one of them with a defective ear, and drove the 3 red pandas to Sichuan. In Luding County, Sichuan Province, Li Mouhua, his son and the defendant Liu Mou B drove to purchase the three red pandas from Luding and were seized by the public security organs on their way back. Since April 2020, Li Mouhua and his son went to Suojiang Qiang Township, Pingwu County, Sichuan Province to purchase 18 live golden monkeys from defendant Ma Cao; 13 of them were hired by Li Mouhua and his son, defendants Zhang Mouhua and Liu Mouyi transported it to Tongling, Anhui Province and sold it to the defendants Xu Mouzhen, Shen Mou and others who ran the zoo, making an illegal profit of 560,000 yuan. After identification, the red pandas involved in the case are all national second-level protected wild animals, with a single value of 40,000 yuan; the golden monkeys are all Sichuan golden monkeys, which are national first-level protected wild animals, with a single value of 500,000 yuan. The Ya'an Municipal People's Procuratorate filed a public prosecution against Li Mouhua and 11 other people for the crime of endangering precious and endangered wild animals, and also filed an incidental civil public interest lawsuit, requesting compensation for the death of Li Mouhua, Li Mouqiu, Liu Moujia, and Long Moujun. The public welfare compensation for 11 wild red pandas totaled 440,000 yuan. Li Mouhua, Li Mouqiu, and Ma Cao compensated 500,000 yuan for the death of a wild golden monkey. Eleven defendants including Li Mouhua jointly disclosed it to the media. Make amends and apologize. ;

;

;;[Judgment Result];

;

;;The Intermediate People’s Court of Ya’an City, Sichuan Province held after trial that Li Mouhua and others illegally hunted The act of catching, selling, purchasing, and transporting rare and endangered wild animals under key state protection shall constitute the crime of endangering precious and endangered wild animals. Among them, Li Mouhua and Li Mouqiu illegally purchased, transported and sold 18 Sichuan golden monkeys, a national first-level protected wild animal, and 18 red pandas, a national second-level protected wild animal. The total value of the wild animals was 9.72 million yuan. The circumstances were particularly serious and comprehensive. Considering that Li Mouhua was a recidivist and confessed, and Li Mouqiu was guilty of meritorious service, Li Mouhua was sentenced to 14 years in prison and fined 500,000 yuan, and Li Mouqiu was sentenced to eight years in prison and fined 300,000 yuan. Ma Moucao illegally hunted and sold 18 Sichuan golden monkeys, a national first-level protected wild animal. The wild animals were worth 9 million yuan. The circumstances were particularly serious. Taking into account the circumstances such as his surrender and other circumstances, Ma Moucao was sentenced to 11 years in prison and fined. 300,000 yuan in gold. The remaining defendants were sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment ranging from three to six years and fines ranging from 50,000 yuan to 250,000 yuan. Zoo operators Liu A and Xu Zhen are also prohibited from engaging in all business activities related to wild animals for five years from the date of completion of the sentence or the date of parole. The court ordered the civil public interest litigation defendants Li Hua, Li Qiu, Liu Jia, and Long Jun to jointly pay public welfare compensation of 440,000 yuan, and Li Hua, Li Mouqiu, and Ma Cao to jointly pay public welfare compensation of 500,000 yuan. Li Mouhua and other eleven people publicly apologized in the media. After the verdict was announced, some of the defendants, including Ma Cao, were dissatisfied and appealed. After hearing the verdict, the Sichuan Higher People's Court ruled to reject the appeal and uphold the original verdict. ;

;

;;[Typical meaning];

;

;;Pingwu County, Mianyang City, Sichuan Province, one of the places where the case occurred, is a giant panda. ;;;5. A criminal incidental civil public interest litigation case involving Wang Min and six others who cut down trees and endangered national key protected plants;;;

;;[Basic Case Facts];

;

;;In February 2022, the defendant Wang Min signed a "Lin Rights Agreement" with Qiao Moumou, an outsider in the case, in the name of his wife. "Forest Land Transfer Contract", the land use rights and forest ownership rights of 3,785 acres of forest land in a village in Liangshui Town, Tumen City, Jilin Province were transferred. In April of the same year, Wang Min used the ID card of Wang, who was not involved in the case, to apply for a forest logging license. The logging locations were three logging areas of Liangshui Forest Farm. The total approved logging volume was 456 cubic meters, and the tree species was oak. From April to May of the same year, Wang Min hired the defendant Zhang Kui to organize multiple people to enter the site for operations. The defendants Sha, Liu Jun, Xu Ren and others were responsible for logging, and the defendant Yang was responsible for returning to the forest and loading the truck. . In addition to the above three approved logging areas, the actual logging area of ​​Wang Moumin and others also includes three unapproved logging areas such as the logging area on the east side of Lengchang, which are collective forest areas or state-owned forest areas; the felled trees include Oak trees, poplar trees, linden trees, etc. It was identified that Wang Min and others violated the tree species, quantity and logging methods specified in the forest logging permit, and illegally felled oak, poplar and other trees with a standing stock of 1,438 cubic meters worth more than 1.31 million yuan; they also felled 485 purple lindens, a national second-level protected plant. The standing timber storage is 257 cubic meters, worth more than 230,000 yuan. The cost was more than 1.56 million yuan, for which Sha, Zhang Mokui and Yang were jointly and severally liable, Liu Jun and Xu Ren were jointly and severally liable for 140,000 yuan, and the six defendants jointly borne the appraisal fee of 5,000 yuan. ;

;

;;[Judgment Result];

;

The circumstances were serious and constituted a crime of endangering nationally protected plants. Wang Min and Sha should be punished for several crimes together with the crime of deforestation and the crime of endangering national key protected plants. The criminal acts of Wang Moumin and six others seriously damaged the ecological environment, endangered the protection of biological diversity, caused serious damage to social and public interests, and should bear civil tort liability. Therefore, Wang Min and six others were sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment ranging from two to seven years, and fines ranging from 10,000 yuan to 1.2 million yuan; Wang Min was responsible for the comprehensive cost of restoring the ecological environment of more than 1.56 million yuan, and Sha was , Zhang Moukui and Yang are jointly and severally liable for this, Liu Moujun and Xu Mouren are jointly and severally liable for 140,000 yuan, and the appraisal fee of 5,000 yuan is jointly borne by the six defendants. ;;;6. Li Mouliang, Yang Mouli’s fire, and Yang Mouli’s illegal hunting criminal incidental civil public interest litigation case;;

;

;;[Basic facts of the case];

;

;;The defendant Li Mouliang and Yang Mouli made an appointment to smoke bees and collect wild honey in the forest, and recorded the process on video For sale in honey. After Yang Mouli and Li Mouliang were arrested and brought to justice, Yang Mouli truthfully confessed his criminal behavior of illegal hunting that the public security organs had not yet grasped. ;

;;[Judgment Result];

;

;;The Second Intermediate People’s Court of Hainan Province held that Li Mouliang and Yang Mouliang Violating forest protection and forest fire prevention regulations, smoking bees to collect honey caused forest fires, causing heavy losses to public and private property, constituting the crime of fire. Yang Mouli violated hunting regulations, used prohibited tools and methods for hunting in the hunting reserve, and destroyed wild animal resources. The circumstances were serious and constituted the crime of illegal hunting. Li Mouliang and Yang Mouli burned a large number of trees due to fire behavior, causing serious damage to local forestry resources and ecological environment, and should bear corresponding civil liability. Therefore, Yang was sentenced to concurrent punishment for the crime of rationalization, and it was decided to execute a fixed-term imprisonment of one year and six months, and Li Mouliang was sentenced to one year and two months; the court ordered Li Mouliang and Yang Mouli to jointly bear the cost of off-site restoration of 267,000 yuan (by paying fees or labor compensation, etc.), ecological service function loss identification and restoration plan preparation costs 30,000 yuan, and joint compensation of 698,736 yuan for losses caused by loss of service functions between the damage to the ecological environment of the destroyed woodland and the completion of restoration. ;;;8. Civil public interest litigation case of Kaihua County People’s Procuratorate of Zhejiang Province against Lu Mouyan and four others for ecological damage;;

;

;;[Basic facts of the case];

;

;;The defendants Lu Mouyan and Xu were husband and wife, and they ran a game shop at a farmer's market in Kaihua County, Zhejiang Province. In November 2018, after receiving a report from a public welfare volunteer, the Kaihua County Forestry Police Bureau seized and detained 3 suspected white pheasants, 11 wild boars, 42 hares, and 23 yellow muntjacs in their warehouse. After investigation, at the end of December 2017, the defendant Wang contacted Xu via WeChat through the defendant Cheng Moujun to purchase an owl, and completed the delivery by recording a slaughtering video for inspection and mailing delivery, and then Wang gave it to a friend for consumption. . After identification, the three suspected white pheasants involved in the case were white pheasants, a national second-level protected animal; the owl was an eagle owl, a national second-level protected animal. After evaluation, Lu Mouyan’s illegal purchase and sale of precious and endangered wild animals and illegal purchase of other wild animals caused damage worth 107,860 yuan to ecological and environmental resources. The act of purchasing other wild animals caused damage worth 97,860 yuan; the illegal purchase of precious and endangered wild animals by Cheng Moujun and Wang caused damage to ecological environment resources worth 15,000 yuan. Four persons, Lu Mouyan, Xu Mou, Wang Mou and Cheng Moujun, were held criminally responsible in another case. The People's Procuratorate of Kaihua County, Zhejiang Province filed a civil public interest litigation with Xu and four other defendants as defendants, claiming that Lu Mouyan should pay 107,860 yuan in compensation for damage to the ecological environment and resources, of which Xu Mou was jointly and severally liable for 97,860 yuan, and Cheng Moujun, Wang each bears joint liability for 15,000 yuan of the compensation; the four defendants apologized in the media. ;

;

;;[Judgment Result];

;

;;After hearing, the Intermediate People’s Court of Quzhou City, Zhejiang Province held that Lu Mouyan and Xu Mou jointly In the process of operating a game shop, they illegally purchased and sold nationally protected wild animals and non-nationally protected wild animals without proof of legal origin. Wang and Cheng Moujun illegally purchased nationally protected wild animals for food purposes. The behavior of the four defendants was harmful to the ecology. Those who cause damage to the environment and resources should bear tort liability. Among them, Lu Mouyan is responsible for all the facts involved in the case and should pay 107,860 yuan in compensation for damage to the ecological environment and resources; Xu Mou is jointly and severally liable with Lu Mouyan for 97,860 yuan of it; Wang Mou and Cheng Moujun are responsible for 15,000 yuan of it. Yuan, Lu Mouyan and Xu bear joint liability for compensation. The judgment therefore supported all the claims of the public interest litigation plaintiff. The judgment has taken legal effect. ;

;

;;[Typical significance];

;

;;This case occurred in the Qianjiangyuan-Qianjiangyuan Park of Baishanzu National Park. Civil public interest litigation cases involving ecological damage caused by the illegal acquisition and sale of nationally protected wild animals. Qianjiangyuan-Baishanzu National Park was included in the national park system pilot in 2016 and is one of the 49 candidate national parks selected by the "National Park Spatial Layout Plan". Qianjiangyuan - Baishanzu National Park Qianjiangyuan Park completely preserves the world's rare and large-scale mid-subtropical low-altitude primary evergreen broad-leaved forest. It is known as "the last ecological virgin land in the Yangtze River Delta" and is also the site of many The last "genetic protection area" for rare and endangered wild animals. Among the wild animals violated in this case, the white pheasant and the eagle owl are rare birds and are national second-level protected animals. As the pattern of the five-rank official uniforms in the Ming and Qing Dynasties, the white pheasant is a symbol of honesty and integrity, and has excellent ornamental value and cultural connotation. The four defendants illegally purchased and sold wild animals, and attempted to evade supervision and accountability by recording slaughter videos for inspection, online payment, and mail delivery. This was an excessive seizure of nature for their own personal gain. The People's Court ordered the four defendants to pay compensation for damage to the ecological environment and resources and apologize in accordance with the law, and to recover ecological losses in addition to criminal liability. It demonstrated the determination to protect the ecological environment of the national park with the strictest system and the most stringent rule of law, and served as a warning to the national park area. Internal personnel carry out business activities in accordance with laws and regulations, promote the harmonious integration of modern civilization and primitive ecology, and jointly build a national park that shares the harmonious coexistence of man and nature. ;

;

;;;9. Zhang Mouyan and Zhang Mouyi v. Yang County Forestry Bureau Right to Life Dispute Case;;

;

; ;[Basic Case Facts];

;

;;On March 18, 2017, mountain patrol personnel discovered that Zheng, a villager from Group 12, Chaoyang Village, Maoping Town, Yangxian County, Hanzhong City, Shaanxi Province He died on the roadside of Xiaohegou in Chaoyang Village. After investigation and inspection by the Yangxian County Public Security Bureau and investigation by the Yangxian Forestry Bureau, it was confirmed that Zheng was injured and died by a takin, a national first-level protected animal. Houyang County Forestry Bureau and Finance Bureau jointly reported to the Hanzhong City Forestry Bureau and Finance Bureau, requesting that the Shaanxi Province Compensation Measures for Personal and Property Damage Caused by Keyly Protected Terrestrial Wild Animals (hereinafter referred to as the "Compensation Measures") and its implementation rules , a compensation fund of 187,820 yuan was provided for Zheng Mouhai’s death (the province’s per capita net income of farmers in 2016 was 9,396 yuan × 20 times), of which 150,336 yuan was shared by the provincial finance and 18,792 yuan was shared by the municipal and county finances. On December 12, 2018, the Hanzhong Municipal Finance Bureau allocated 150,336 yuan in provincial fiscal funds for the death of Zheng Mouhai, who was injured by a takin. Because Zheng's relatives did not reach an agreement on the distribution of the compensation, the compensation was not paid. Zheng Mouhai's parents are deceased. Zheng Mouhai and his ex-wife had two daughters, Zhang Mouyan and Zhang Mouyi, during his lifetime. Zhang Mouyan and Zhang Mouyi then filed a lawsuit on the grounds of dispute over the right to life, requesting the Yangxian County Forestry Bureau to compensate for the loss of 216,933 yuan. During the trial, both parties had no objection to the compensation amount of 187,820 yuan. The Yangxian County Forestry Bureau also recognized that the two plaintiffs were the first legal heirs of the deceased Zheng Mouhai. ;

;

;;[Judgment Result];

;

;;The People's Court of Yangxian County, Hanzhong City, Shaanxi Province held that the second judgment of the "Compensation Measures" , Articles 8 and 9 stipulate that, as confirmed by the forestry administrative department of the people's government at or above the county level, if personal injury or property loss caused by nationally and provincially protected terrestrial wild animals in the administrative region of this province meets the prescribed circumstances, the victim shall have the right to comply with these Measures. The right to obtain government compensation; if death is caused, a one-time damage compensation (including funeral subsidies) will be given, with the standard being 20 times the per capita net income of farmers in the province in the previous year; 80% of the compensation for personal and property damage shall be borne by the provincial finance, set District, city, and county-level finances each bear 10%. Accordingly, as the daughter of Zheng Mouhai, the second plaintiff has the right to apply for compensation from the government in accordance with the law. As the forestry administrative unit of the Yangxian County People's Government, the Yangxian Forestry Bureau should perform its legal obligations in accordance with the "Compensation Measures". It was then ruled that the Yangxian Forestry Bureau should pay Zhang Mouyan and Zhang Mouyi a compensation of 150,336 yuan that had been allocated by the provincial finance; the compensation of 18,792 yuan shared by the municipal and county finances should be paid by the Yangxian Forestry Bureau to the financial department. Pay after declaration; reject the plaintiff’s other claims. ;

;

;;[Typical significance];

;

;;This case was caused by a nationally protected wild animal that occurred in the Giant Panda National Park area. Disputes arising from death. The takin is a national first-level protected animal and is known as the "Four Treasures of the Qinling Mountains" along with the giant panda, crested ibis, and golden monkey. They are all rare species living in the Giant Panda National Park. With the deepening of the construction of ecological civilization in my country, the habitats and living spaces of wild animals continue to expand, and incidents of wild animals hurting people occur from time to time. Article 19 of the "Wild Animal Protection Law of the People's Republic of China" stipulates that if the protection of wild animals protected by this law causes casualties, crops or other property losses, the local people's government shall provide compensation. The specific measures shall be determined by the provincial people's government. formulated. In this case, the People's Court referred to the province's compensation regulations and ruled that the defendant should pay corresponding compensation, which better balances the dual goals of wildlife protection and safeguarding the safety of people's lives and property, and has positive significance for building a good ecological environment where man and nature coexist harmoniously. . At the same time, the People's Court promptly issued judicial suggestions to the forestry authorities, urging them to effectively improve the prevention awareness of surrounding people and ensure the personal and property safety of surrounding people by setting up warning signs in wildlife reserves and strengthening patrols during animal active periods. The concrete embodiment of the concept of active justice in environmental resources trial work. ;

;

;;;10. Bankruptcy and Reorganization Case of a Hydropower Development Company in Qinghai;;

;

;;[Basic Case Facts] ;

;

;;The Yellow River Mar Dam Hydropower Station constructed by a hydropower development company in Qinghai is one of the first projects included in the national infrastructure field to encourage social investment, and is an important node in realizing the west-to-east power transmission project. The project started the preliminary construction in October 2010, and completed the construction of diversion tunnels, upstream and downstream cofferdams, etc. Later, due to a break in the capital chain of a hydropower development company in Qinghai, the construction funds could not be received in full on time, resulting in Mal The water-blocking power station was shut down, national key projects were difficult to implement, resettlement was at a standstill, and flood control hazards became increasingly serious. After the out-of-court reorganization failed to attract investors, it applied for bankruptcy reorganization in the People's Court. In June 2020, the Intermediate People's Court of Xining City, Qinghai Province accepted the bankruptcy and reorganization case of a hydropower development company in Qinghai in accordance with the law. In November of the same year, an energy investment group company, as a strategic investor in the bankruptcy and reorganization of a hydropower development company in Qinghai, signed a bankruptcy reorganization agreement with the bankruptcy administrator. In April 2021, the Xining Intermediate People's Court organized the second creditors meeting and approved the draft reorganization plan and other documents. According to the reorganization plan, reorganization investors will continue to statically invest hundreds of billions of yuan to build a "water, light and wind integration" comprehensive energy base in Malda, driving the development of new energy sources such as pumped storage, photovoltaic, wind power and chemical energy storage. develop and use. The manager of a hydropower development company in Qinghai applied for court approval of a reorganization plan. ;

;

;;[Judgment Result];

;

;;After review, the Xining Intermediate People’s Court held that a hydropower development company in Qinghai cannot pay off its due debts Debt, and there is a clear possibility of losing its ability to repay. The bankruptcy reorganization of a hydropower development company in Qinghai will be more conducive to protecting the overall interests of creditors, debtors and company employees, and will also help solve the floods in the upper reaches of the Yellow River caused by the suspension of the project. Safety and ecological environment restoration and management problems. The preparation, voting procedures and content of the reorganization plan in this case are in compliance with legal requirements and are feasible. The ruling was then made to approve the reorganization plan of a hydropower development company in Qinghai and terminate the reorganization process. ;

;

;;[Typical significance];

;

;;The hydropower station in this case is located at the junction of Tongde County, Hainan Prefecture, Qinghai Province and Maqin County, Guoluo Prefecture The main stream of the Yellow River is located within the scope of the Sanjiangyuan National Park. It is a key hydropower project planned and constructed in the national "Twelfth Five-Year Plan". The suspension of the project involved in the case not only has a negative impact on economic development and resettlement, but also has a great impact on the safety of the upper reaches of the Yellow River during floods, ecological restoration, and environmental governance. After the People's Court accepted the case and carried out bankruptcy reorganization, it gave full play to its judicial functions, properly handled the relationship between protection and development, strengthened coordination with relevant government departments, promoted the full resumption of work of the hydropower station involved in the case, effectively resolved the corporate bankruptcy dispute, and also made Sanjiangyuan Flood control work in the upper reaches of the Yellow River in the national park has been strengthened, and the ecological environment management difficulties that may have been caused by the project suspension have also been solved. At the same time, the construction of the "water, light and wind integration" comprehensive energy base in Malda will also lead to the optimization of the energy structure in the area around Sanjiangyuan National Park, which will help promote the green and high-quality development of the local economy and society to a new level. ;
